entries.meaning: (Greek mythology) A member of a mythical race of humans living in Africa, who have one single, large foot which they use to shade themselves from the rays of the sun. [from 19th c.]
examples: To the modern viewer, though, it is the weirdness that most enthrals: the rich, demonic and comical features, like the sciapod â€“ a man deploying his single swollen foot to shield himself from the sun.
